Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#656-669):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#668)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#669)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#530-613):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#539-552)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#557-559)
	- updateInheritedEarlyParticipantWhitelist(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#575-578)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#592-594)
	- tokensSold (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#599-601)
	- weiRaised (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#595-599)

	External calls:

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#530-613):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#539-552)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#557-559)
	- updateInheritedEarlyParticipantWhitelist(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#575-578)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#588-592)
	- investorCount (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#587)

Reentrancy in MintedTokenCappedCrowdsaleExt.setMaximumSellableTokens (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(! lastTierCntrct.finalized()) (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- maximumSellableTokens (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol)

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#915-926) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#923-926)
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_contracts/0x2cd00f82050d35135f24dc0ae5a87ce51fe41513.sol#924-926)
